comments: This gives the number of vector ([1]) irreducible representations in the n-th excited state of an oscillator model of bosons. A005290 counts the scalar ([0]) representations, A005292 the rank-2 tensor representations ([2]). - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 30 2010a(2)..a(12) coincide with A182712(n-1). - _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 07 2012
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. L. Curtright and C. B. Thorn, Symmetry patterns in the mass spectra of dual string models, Nuclear Phys. B 274 (1986), 520-588.
maple: G3(1); # Using the code in A005290. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Apr 30 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Apr 30 2016
